subject: Subject: Refund for Purchase on [Date]
body:
Dear [Customer],
Thank you for your purchase on [Date]. We have processed a refund of $[Amount] to your account. Please provide your account and routing numbers so we can complete the transaction.
Thank you,
[Your Company]
label: phish

subject: Subject: Meeting Request - [Topic] on [Date]
body: Hi [Recipient],\nI'm writing to see if you are available for a meeting on [Date]. I would like to discuss [Topic].\nIf you are not available, please let me know when would be a good time to meet.
label: benign

subject: Subject: Update your account information now
body:
Dear Valued Customer,
Our records indicate that your account information needs to be updated immediately. Failure to update your information may result in service interruption. Please click on the link below to update your information.
www.updateaccount-secure.com
Customer Service
label: phish

subject: Subject: Team lunch next Friday
body:
Hey team,
I'd like to organize a team lunch next Friday at 12:30pm. Please let me know if you can join and if you have any dietary restrictions.
Looking forward to catching up with everyone!
Best regards,
[Name]
label: benign

subject: Subject: Your Netflix account has been suspended
body: Dear Netflix Customer,\nWe could not process your last payment. Your account has been suspended. To continue watching, please update your payment information by following this link: https://netflix-accounts-verify.com\nNetflix Support Team
label: phish

subject: Subject: Account Recovery Request
body: Dear [Customer],\nWe are unable to locate your account using the email address you provided. In order to recover your account, please provide us with your password.
label: phish

subject: Subject: Thanks for getting that to me
body: Hey,\nI wanted to quickly thank you for sending me the document. It looks great and I really appreciate you taking the time to get it done so promptly.\nThanks again!
label: benign

subject: Subject: Important Information about Your Financial Accounts
body:
Dear Customer,
We hope this message finds you well! We wanted to make sure you had access to important financial information regarding your accounts.
Please click on the link below to access a secure website where you can view your account summary, current transactions, as well as other financial data.

If you have any questions or concerns about your accounts, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.
Thank you for your continued business!
Sincerely,
Financial Team
label: phish

subject: Subject: Project status update
body:
Hi team,
Just wanted to provide a quick update on the project status. We've completed the first phase and are now moving to implementation. Let me know if you have any questions about the timeline.
Regards,
Project Manager
label: benign

subject: Subject: Urgent: Your PayPal account access has been limited
body:
Dear valued customer,
Your PayPal account access has been limited due to suspicious activity. To restore full access to your account, please verify your information by clicking on the link below:
http://paypal-secure-verification.com
Regards,
PayPal Security Team
label: phish

subject: Subject: Weekly team standup
body:
Hello everyone,
Just a reminder that we have our weekly standup tomorrow at 10am. Please be prepared to share your updates on what you've accomplished this week and what you're planning for next week.
See you there!
Team Lead
label: benign

subject: Subject: Security Alert - Login Attempt from Unknown Device
body: We detected a login attempt to your account from an unknown device in [Foreign Country]. If this wasn't you, please secure your account immediately by resetting your password here: securemyaccount-login.net
label: phish

subject: Subject: Office Closure - Holiday Weekend
body:
All employees,
Please note that the office will be closed on Monday, May 30th in observance of Memorial Day. Regular business hours will resume on Tuesday, May 31st.
Enjoy your long weekend!
Human Resources
label: benign

subject: Subject: Microsoft: Unusual sign-in activity
body: Microsoft security team has detected unusual sign-in activity on your account. Multiple failed login attempts were recorded from different locations. Verify your identity and secure your account at: ms-account-verify-login.com
label: phish

subject: Subject: Documentation for the new process
body:
Hi all,
Attached you'll find the documentation for the new process we discussed in yesterday's meeting. Please review it and let me know if you have any questions or suggestions for improvement.
Thanks,
Process Team
label: benign

subject: Subject: URGENT ACTION REQUIRED: Invoice Overdue
body: Our accounting department has notified us that invoice #12345 is severely overdue. To avoid further charges, please update your payment information and process this payment immediately at: accounts-payable-center.com/pay
label: phish

subject: Subject: Upcoming PTO Request
body:
Hi Manager,
I'd like to request time off from July 15-22 for a family vacation. I've already coordinated with the team to ensure coverage during my absence. Let me know if you need any additional information.
Thanks,
Employee
label: benign

subject: Subject: Amazon Delivery Attempt Failed
body: Dear Amazon Customer,\nWe attempted to deliver your package today but were unable to complete the delivery. Please confirm your address details by clicking the link below so we can reschedule your delivery: amazon-delivery-reschedule.net\nAmazon Delivery Team
label: phish

subject: Subject: Minutes from the strategy meeting
body:
Team,
Attached are the minutes from yesterday's strategy meeting. Please review and let me know if there are any corrections or additions needed before I distribute them more widely.
Best,
Meeting Coordinator
label: benign

subject: Subject: IT Security Alert: Mandatory Password Reset
body: Due to a recent security incident, all employees must reset their passwords within 24 hours. Failure to do so will result in account lockout. Reset your password at: company-password-reset.net
label: phish

subject: Subject: Feedback on the draft proposal
body:
Hi,
I've reviewed the draft proposal you sent over and have a few thoughts. Overall, it looks good, but I think we should strengthen section 3 on implementation timeline. Let me know when you're free to discuss.
Regards,
Reviewer
label: benign

subject: Subject: iCloud Storage Full - Action Required
body: Your iCloud storage is full and backups have stopped. To avoid losing important data, verify your payment information and upgrade your storage plan here: icloud-storage-payment.com\nApple Support
label: phish

subject: Subject: Lunch & Learn session next week
body:
Hi everyone,
We're hosting a Lunch & Learn session next Wednesday from 12-1pm in the main conference room. The topic will be 'Effective Communication in Remote Teams.' Lunch will be provided!
Hope to see you there,
Learning & Development Team
label: benign

subject: Subject: Confirmed: Unauthorized Transactions on Your Account
body: We've detected unauthorized transactions on your credit card ending in 1234. To dispute these charges and secure your account, please verify your identity at: fraud-protection-secure.com\nBank Security Team
label: phish

subject: Subject: Resource allocation for Q2
body:
Management team,
Attached is the proposed resource allocation for Q2 projects. Please review your department's allocation and let me know if you foresee any issues or need adjustments before our planning meeting on Friday.
Thanks,
Operations
label: benign

subject: Subject: Delivery address confirmation needed
body: Hello,\nWe're processing your recent order but need to confirm your delivery address. Please click here to confirm your shipping information: order-shipping-confirm.net\nCustomer Service
label: phish

subject: Subject: Upcoming system maintenance
body: All users,\nThe IT department will be performing system maintenance this weekend, starting Friday at 8pm and ending Sunday at 6am. During this time, some systems may be unavailable. Please save your work before leaving on Friday.\nIT Support
label: benign

subject: Subject: FINAL WARNING: Tax Return Discrepancy
body: The IRS has identified discrepancies in your recent tax filing. To avoid penalties and potential legal action, please review and confirm your information: irs-tax-verification.com\nInternal Revenue Service
label: phish

subject: Subject: Calendar invitation: Quarterly review
body:
You've been invited to the quarterly review meeting on April 15 at 2pm in Conference Room B. Please confirm your attendance by responding to this invitation.
Agenda:
1. Q1 performance review
2. Q2 goals discussion
3. Budget updates
label: benign

subject: Subject: Docusign: Important Documents Requiring Signature
body:
Dear Professional,
You have received important documents that require your urgent signature. Please review and sign these documents within 24 hours by clicking here: docusign-document-portal.net
Thank you,
Legal Department
label: phish
